entities.name: Accounting Tab (Accounting Registration)
entities.main_function: Display and management of accounting information, financial data, and payment processing
entities.document_purpose: Analyze the impact of the Basic Tab (Basic Information) on the Accounting Tab
entities.analysis_scope: When basic information is changed in the Basic Tab → Direct impact on data/options in the Accounting Tab

entities.name: Tab Click Processing from Basic to Accounting
entities.section_title: Tab Click Processing from Basic to Accounting
entities.mermaid_diagram:
flowchart TD A[User clicks Accounting tab] --> B[Get sinkiSakuseiKbn from Basic] B --> C{sinkiSakuseiKbn
Allow tab switching?} C -->|No| D[Do not allow tab switching] C -->|Yes| E[Get KeiyakuStatusCd and hensyuMode from Basic] E --> F[Status analysis] F --> G[KeiyakuStatusCd = 00/99
hensyuMode = 0] F --> H[KeiyakuStatusCd ≠ 00/99
hensyuMode = 0] F --> I[hensyuMode = 1] G --> J[KeiriInitAction
keiyakuNewtmp/keiri.jsp] H --> K[KeiriLockInitAction
keiyakuLock/keiri.jsp] I --> L[KeiriHenkouInitAction
keiyakuHenkou/keiri.jsp] style A fill:#e1f5fe style D fill:#ffcdd2 style J fill:#f3e5f5 style K fill:#f3e5f5 style L fill:#f3e5f5

entities.name: Data displayed in the Accounting Tab:
entities.section_title: Data displayed in the Accounting Tab:

entities.name: **Contractor Editing (J0001)**
entities.ui_impact: B0003.jsp displays updated contractor information for accounting registration and financial processing

entities.name: **Joint Contractor Editing (J0002)**
entities.database_impact: Joint contractor data updated in DB
entities.action_impact: KeiriInitAction retrieves new joint contractor data
entities.ui_impact: B0003.jsp displays updated joint contractor information for accounting purposes and payment processing

entities.name: **Guarantor Editing (J0003)**
entities.ui_impact: B0003.jsp displays updated guarantor information for accounting purposes and financial calculations

entities.name: **Block Deletion (J0001/J0002/J0003)**
entities.ui_impact: B0003.jsp removes accounting information for deleted targets and updates financial calculations

entities.name: **Registration Button (Saving Basic)**
entities.database_impact: All Basic changes saved to DB
entities.ui_impact: B0003.jsp displays updated contractor/case information for accounting registration and financial data management

entities.name: Tab Cancellation Information (Cancellation Information)

entities.name: Data displayed in the Cancellation Information tab:
entities.section_title: Data displayed in the Cancellation Information tab:

entities.name: **Contractor Editing (J0001)**
entities.ui_impact: JH02.jsp updates contractor card for cancellation processing, E0010.jsp updates contractor information for cancellation reason

entities.name: **Co-contractor Editing (J0002)**
entities.ui_impact: E0010.jsp displays updated co-contractor information for cancellation processing and reason analysis

entities.name: **Guarantor Editing (J0003)**
entities.ui_impact: E0010.jsp displays updated guarantor information for cancellation processing and impact assessment

entities.name: **Block Deletion (J0001/J0002/J0003)**
entities.ui_impact: E0010.jsp removes party information from cancellation processing, E0005.jsp updates cancellation reason with no deletion target

entities.name: **Register Button (Basic save)**
entities.database_impact: All Basic changes saved to DB
entities.ui_impact: All cancellation blocks (E0003, E0010, E0005) display updated contractor/case information for cancellation processing and reason management

jsp_descriptions: B0022.jsp: Construction planning order process checkboxes
J0052.jsp: Construction planning table (displays construction items, departments, and schedule)

entities.name: **Contractor Edit (J0001)**
entities.ui_impact: JH02.jsp updates the contractor card for construction planning, JH06.jsp updates the order number of the construction project

entities.name: **Joint Contractor Edit (J0002)**
entities.database_impact: Joint contractor data updated in DB
entities.action_impact: KouteiInitAction retrieves new joint contractor data
entities.ui_impact: JH02.jsp updates joint contractor information for construction contract, J0052.jsp may update the construction planning table

entities.name: **Joint Guarantor Edit (J0003)**
entities.ui_impact: JH02.jsp updates guarantor information for construction contract, B0022.jsp may update order process checkboxes

entities.name: **Block Deletion (J0001/J0002/J0003)**
entities.ui_impact: JH02.jsp removes the deleted party information from construction contract, JH03.jsp updates construction information without the deleted target

entities.name: **Register Button (Save Basic)**
entities.database_impact: All basic changes saved to DB
entities.ui_impact: JH03.jsp updates construction information, JH02.jsp updates contractor details, J0052.jsp updates construction planning table with new project data

entities.name: Data displayed in the Order Tab:
entities.section_title: Data displayed in the Order Tab:
jsp_descriptions: J0081.jsp: Primary order (constructor name when the contract includes multiple construction companies)
J0082.jsp: Primary order (insurance company name when enrolled in housing defect liability insurance)
J0005.jsp: Contract construction period (construction period information)
J0093.jsp: Site supervisor assignment (site supervisor deployment information)

entities.name: **Contractor Editing (J0001)**
entities.ui_impact: J0005.jsp, J0006.jsp, J0007.jsp display updated contractor information for order processing, delivery details also updated

entities.name: **Joint Contractor Editing (J0002)**
entities.database_impact: Joint contractor data updated in DB
entities.action_impact: JyutyuInitAction retrieves new joint contractor data
entities.ui_impact: J0081.jsp displays updated joint contractor information for multiple constructor list, J0082.jsp may update defect liability insurance company information

entities.name: **Joint Guarantor Editing (J0003)**
entities.ui_impact: Order information block displays updated guarantor information for order processing and delivery

entities.name: **Block Deletion (J0001/J0002/J0003)**
entities.ui_impact: J0081.jsp removes deletion targets from multiple constructor list, J0005~J0007 display order information without deleted targets

entities.name: **Register Button (Basic Save)**
entities.database_impact: All basic changes saved to DB
entities.ui_impact: All order blocks (J0005, J0006, J0007, J0093) display updated contractor/case information for order processing and delivery management

entities.ui_impact: J0015.jsp updates display of contractor supplementary clauses/conditions, J0075.jsp updates housing-specific supplementary items

entities.database_impact: Joint contractor data updated in DB

entities.name: **Guarantor Edit (J0003)**
